features: Brighten the mood with Uplift Your Day in the air. Feel the dual blend of Brazilian Orange and North African Neroli blossom. Energize the atmosphere with this room air freshener and enjoy this moment.

Glade plug in refills are consciously crafted with fragrance infused with essential oils that are traced to the countries of origin, and contains no parabens, phthalates, nitro musks, artificial colors or dyes.
These plug in refills work with Glade Aromatherapy air freshener dispenser.
Long Lasting Authentic Fragrance lasts up to 60 days (on low setting)
Glade Aromatherapy Electric Scented Oil refills contain fragrances infused with 2x more essential oils (vs Glade Electric scented oil).
body.description: Relax the mood with Glade Aromatherapy Electric oil diffuser refills. Melt into a dual blend of essential oil-infused fragrance and Uplift Your Day This Glade air freshener refill uses fragrance infused with essential oils that are traced to the countries of origin. Infuse your day with the blend of Brazilian Orange and North African Neroli blossom. Glade plug in diffuseris consciously crafted for a life in balance, made without parabens, phthalates, nitro musks, artificial colors or dyes. Own the mood with each breath. Glade refill contains fragrances infused with 2x more essential oils (vs Glade Electric scented oil). Works with GladePlug In air freshener dispenser. Long Lasting Authentic Fragrance lasts up to 60 days (on low setting)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Aromatherapy Plug In Refills
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these plug in refills in the scent Uplift Your Day. It is a very pleasant, bright scent that I’m pleased to have in my kitchen. It is orange and neroli scented, so it definitely brings the citrus scent to the front. It is a nice rich scent, not a boring single note but rather something with some personality. They fit in the regular Glade warmers just fine, and you can get quite a few for a great price. I’m interested in trying the other scents in this line and will definitely be testing them once these run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these plug in in the Uplift Your Day scent. I’ve had one in for about 3 weeks and it still smells really good. They last for several weeks before you need to replace them. This one smells citrusy, almost like a floral and orange combined. It’s very pleasant. Although they fit fine in my glade plug in, these do not come with a plug in unit. I like that you can control how strong you want the scent to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value if You Are Already Using this System
reviews.reviewText: The fragrance is what you would expect from Glade. If not used in a big area, the fragrance can come across as a bit strong. However, for how many bottles you get for the price, it's a good deal. In fact, I don't even think you need to use the dispenser for this. You just need to open up the cap and place the bottle at the desired location and it would infuse that space with the fragrance.With this many bottles, I think they will last me a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality Great quality product that adds a nice touch of scent to any room. Love this flavor - it's much nicer and more "elegant" smelling than most air fresheners which have a cheap chemical-y smell. Note that this is only a refill pack and you will first need the Glade Plug Ins dispenser product to use this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant unique scent from Glade
reviews.reviewText: I like the Glade Aromatherapy line of scents because they have unique scent combinations and without a strong artificial chemical undertone. I was getting sick of spring mist and clean laundry.These work with the Glade plug-in device, so you need one of those. They last a few weeks and put out a noticeable and consistent amount of fragrance throughout that time. This particular scent is very heavy on orange, which I find refreshing and pleasant. I will get this scent again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits older plug ins
reviews.reviewText: You don't need to purchase a new plug in holder if you have the older models. They fit just fine in my plug ins with the fragrance dial on the front of the unit. Mine are from back when they had the little seashell logo on the front of the refill bulb.The fragrance is very Neroli forward with the citrus notes in the background. If you like Tom Ford Neroli Portofino, you might like this scent. It doesn't have the bergamot notes but I do think it shares a lot of the same notes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These smell horrible, nothing like the description. I threw them all away and wish I hadn't wasted money on them. I'm a fan of these Glade plug ins, but not this scent (aromatherapy orange neroli).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can Barely Smell It
reviews.reviewText: I've tried. Two different plug in devices. Two different plug ins of this. The scent is pleasant enough, but I can't smell it at all unless I'm right up on it. I don't think the scent is strong enough. I love Glade, but will go back to using a stronger scent.
